item.title: Hello World
item.description:
This is my first post.
I will be using this blog to share deep dives on C++ development, HPC, and personal projects.

item.title: About me
item.description:
Hey, I’m Andr√©s.

I’m a software engineer who cares a lot about three things: performance, reliability, and building tools that last. My strongest experience is in C++ systems and Java applications, especially in areas involving graphs, parallel computing, and discrete optimization.

Since 2021 I’ve been part of the team that develops studioSL, a reservoir simulation platform used globally in energy operations. My work focuses on turning engineering requirements into solid code, improving performance, enhancing usability, and keeping the platform stable through strong test coverage and constant code reviews.
